comment.author: 51729007@N02
comment._content:
BIG excitement! The first photo from my home town/ish! The amazing thing is that without the men and their clothes this could very easily be mistaken for a photo taken within the past 20 years, I've spent many hours playing in and around old sheds like this one!

Thanks to the Powerhouse for bringing back some wonderful memories.. I can still smell the oils soaked into the timber, feel the grass seeds scratching through my socks and taste the squashed sandwiches Dad packed for us :)
